channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache DolphinScheduler
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache DolphinScheduler

item.title: CVE-2023-25601|2024-10-21T15:08:23.574Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dolphinscheduler
item.description: On version 3.0.0 through 3.1.1, Apache DolphinScheduler's python gateway suffered from improper authentication: an attacker could use a socket bytes attack without authentication. This issue has been fixed from version 3.1.2 onwards. For users who use version 3.0.0 to 3.1.1, you can turn off the python-gateway function by changing the value `python-gateway.enabled=false` in configuration file `application.yaml`. If you are using the python gateway, please upgrade to version 3.1.2 or above.

item.title: CVE-2024-43202|2024-08-20T15:02:42.396Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dolphinscheduler
item.description:
Exposure of Remote Code Execution in Apache Dolphinscheduler.
This issue affects Apache DolphinScheduler: before 3.2.2.
We recommend users to upgrade Apache DolphinScheduler to version 3.2.2, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-43202|2024-08-20T07:29:43.170Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dolphinscheduler

item.title: CVE-2024-29831|2024-08-12T17:49:00.242Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dolphinscheduler
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Apache DolphinScheduler. An authenticated user can cause arbitrary, unsandboxed javascript to be executed on the server. If you are using the switch task plugin, please upgrade to version 3.2.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-30188|2024-08-09T15:02:52.394Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dolphinscheduler
item.description:
File read and write vulnerability in Apache DolphinScheduler , authenticated users can illegally access additional resource files. This issue affects Apache DolphinScheduler: from 3.1.0 before 3.2.2.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 3.2.2, which fixes the issue.
